name: CITY BALLS VR
description: THE jump'n'run experience for VR! Beat the time by completing all games on the rooftops as fast as possible.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win10 64 Bit Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980 equivalent or better Storage: 1400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
